content.text:
# Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Male Playback Singer

| year2            = 2018
| holder           = Naimul Islam Ratul (2018)
| most_awards      = Andrew Kishore(8 awards)
| award1_type      = Total awarded
| award1_winner    = 39
| award2_type      = First winner
| award2_winner    = Abdul Alim (1975)
| website          =
}}
Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Male Playback Singer () is the highest award for male film playback singers in Bangladesh. The award was first presented in 1975,
